item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Our iconic hiking shoe for men brings an updated look to all-terrain adventures. We carried over the fit, durability, and performance of our award-winning Targhee waterproof boot and took its rugged looks to a new dimension. Weighing 15.87 oz / 499.9 g (per shoe), made with durable, waterproof leather and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.84
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:57 UTC – Details)


Our iconic hiking shoe for men brings an updated look to all-terrain adventures. We carried over the fit, durability, and performance of our award-winning Targhee waterproof boot and took its rugged looks to a new dimension. Weighing 15.87 oz / 499.9 g (per shoe), made with durable, waterproof leather and featuring a moisture-wicking lining, the KEEN Men’s Targhee 3 Mid Height Waterproof Hiking Boot is built off KEEN’s traditional wider footwear form. KEEN products are consciously created using a natural, pesticide-free probiotic-based technology called Eco Anti-Odor for breaking down odor in sweat, PFC-free water repellent (in applicable styles) and leather sourced from Leather Working Group (LWG)-certified tanneries. KEEN makes shoes to make a difference. From the products it makes, to the actions the it takes, KEEN inspires people to live and work monumental every day. As a brand born for life outside, KEEN has a responsibility to protect and conserve the places where all people live, play and work.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 1.14 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1017787
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 11, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Keen Adults – US SHOES
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01N120SDH

Imported
Shaft measures approximately Ankle from arch
WATERPROOF: KEEN.DRY waterproof breathable membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable all day long by allowing vapor out without letting water in
TRACTION: KEEN ALL-TERRAIN rubber outsole provides high traction grip in muddy environments and on rocky surfaces; Non marking rubber outsoles leaves no trace or imprints when walking indoors
SUPPORT: External Support Shank and mid cut height adds ankle support and balance on uneven surfaces; Contoured heel provides next level stability
FIT: Mid profile upper for comfort and secure fit with padded tongue and collar
COMFORT: Removable metatomical footbed design provides excellent arch support and cradles to the natural contours of the foot

Read more

Read more

Read more

PFC-Free Construction

  • PFCs (perfluorinated chemicals) are used everywhere in the outdoor industry.
  • They create a dense coating on fabrics; water beads up instead of soaking in.
  • They’re durable, and they do a good job. However, they’re also suspected carcinogens and break down very slowly.

Breathable Mesh

  • Heat has met its mesh.
  • Breeze through the heat with a lightweight performance mesh upper, mesh panels, and a breathable mesh lining, all designed to keep feet cool.

KEEN.DRY Waterproof

  • Don’t sweat the tough stuff.
  • Push your limits with the help of KEEN.DRY, a waterproof, breathable membrane that lets vapor out without letting water in.

Read more

item.title: adidas outdoor Men’s Terrex Ax3 Hiking Boot
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Go fast on the trail. These lightweight shoes are built for speed across rugged terrain. A durable rubber outsole gives you surefooted grip on wet and dry surfaces on your trail run or hike. Gehen Sie schnell auf den Wanderweg. Diese leichten Schuhe sind für Geschwindigkeit auf unebenem Gelände konzipiert. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $48.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:25:38 UTC – Details)


Go fast on the trail. These lightweight shoes are built for speed across rugged terrain. A durable rubber outsole gives you surefooted grip on wet and dry surfaces on your trail run or hike.

Gehen Sie schnell auf den Wanderweg. Diese leichten Schuhe sind für Geschwindigkeit auf unebenem Gelände konzipiert. Eine strapazierfähige Gummi-Außensohle gibt Ihnen sicheren Halt auf nassen und trockenen Oberflächen auf Ihrem Trailrunning oder Wandern.

לכו מהר על המסלול. נעליים קלות משקל אלה בנויות למהירות על פני שטח קשים. סוליית גומי עמידה מעניקה לכם אחיזה בטוחה על משטחים רטובים ויבשים בריצה או בטיול שלכם.

انطلق بسرعة على الطريق. تم تصميم هذه الأحذية خفيفة الوزن من أجل السرعة عبر التضاريس الوعرة. نعل خارجي مطاطي متين يمنحك الثبات على الأسطح الرطبة والجافة أثناء الجري أو التنزه سيرًا على الأقدام.

Vá rápido na trilha. Estes sapatos leves são construídos para velocidade em terrenos acidentados. Uma sola de borracha durável dá a você uma aderência segura em superfícies molhadas e secas em sua corrida ou caminhada.

在小路上快速走。 這些輕便的鞋子專為在崎嶇地形上速度而設計。 耐用的橡膠外底可在越野跑步或健行時,在潮濕和乾燥的表面上提供穩固的抓地力。

快速前进。 这些轻质鞋专为在崎岖地形上速度而设计。 耐用的橡胶外底让您在越野跑步或徒步旅行的潮湿和干燥地面上提供稳定的抓地力。
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No

From the brand

The Brand That Works

For over 20 years we have grown to provide products to suit your every need.

Our products are the foundation of a strong boot & shoe-care line.

We value our customers greatly, and we hope you’ll agree that JobSite is “The Brand That Works”.

How did we get our start?

JobSite was founded by experts in shoe care and repair. The owners designed and sold products in brick and mortar stores around the country before expanding to online marketplaces such as Amazon.

What makes our products unique?

Our team’s experience in the industry helps us design high quality and affordable products. We stand behind our products.

What problem are we solving?

Our products are built as tough as the people that buy them. They work great on the job or at home.

Affordable, quality products

Products built to last…

NO MOUNTING REQUIRED: Side step plates keep it in place without bolting down
EXTRA WIDE: Wide design can fit large boots
BUILT TO LAST: Heavy Duty high density composite molded plastic sides & welded metal frame make this scraper able to withstand all weather elements without rotting or cracking
ALL WEATHER: Other brands use wood edges that rot and crack when they get wet or exposed to extreme heat and cold, our heavy duty plastic edges will not
TRUSTED BRAND: We guarantee our product will be the best you have ever owned or we will provide a full refund
